attributes.action: To not - Supply extra funding to Afirican states and to rather support internal issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown promised to supply a fund of 8.5 billion pounds over ten years to support education etc in African countries, there are far more important issues in the intenal funding crisis than issue monies to African countries

NHS, Terrorisim, border controls are just a few

Spend the money in UK issues before G Brown seeks to improve onther countries problems

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
